execution_plan.description: Fetch the 20 most recently updated orders from the EU sales database. Include order id, customer id, total amount, update timestamp, coupon code, and a constant region tag.
execution_plan.query: SELECT id AS order_id, customer_id, total_eur, updated_at, coupon_code, 'EU' AS region FROM orders ORDER BY updated_at DESC LIMIT 20;

execution_plan.description: Fetch the 20 most recently updated orders from the US sales database. Include order id, customer id, total amount, update timestamp, coupon code, and a constant region tag.
execution_plan.query: SELECT id AS order_id, customer_id, total_eur, updated_at, coupon_code, 'US' AS region FROM orders ORDER BY updated_at DESC LIMIT 20;
